name: forex-trade-summarizer-llm-service
description: FOREX Trade Summarizer is Spring Boot, Apache Nifi, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, Java, LLM application that summarizes trade events using Java LLM libraries

scripts.docker-stop-remove-build-all: (sh DevOps/Descriptors/docker-stop-all.sh || true) && (sh DevOps/Descriptors/docker-remove-all.sh || true) && (sh DevOps/Descriptors/docker-build-all.sh || true)
